original_text: Masters, be fair to your servants. Give them what is right. Remember that you also serve a master, and he is in heaven. Thessalonians Introduction
korean_text: 상전들아 의와 공평을 종들에게 베풀지니 너희에게도 하늘에 상전이 계심을 알지어다

sentences.original_text: Masters, be fair to your servants.
Remember that you also serve a master,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 또한 한 주인을 섬기는 것을 기억하라,
